servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

ptxt.emph: DTC P0111: Intake Air Temperature Sensor 1 Circuit Range Performance

entry.ptxt: Output voltage of IAT sensor signal circuit is unchanged even if elapsed time from engine starting is longer than 10 min.

item.ptxt: When performing a road test, select a place where there is no traffic or possibility of a traffic accident and be very careful during testing to avoid occurrence of an accident.
Road test should be carried out by 2 persons, a driver and a tester, on a level road.
If any other DTC is detected before identify DTC presently under confirmation procedure, perform detected DTC troubleshooting first.
Check to make sure that the following condition is satisfied when using this procedure.

s1.ptxt: Start engine and warm up to normal operating temperature.
Drive vehicle at 60 – 100 km/h (37 – 62 mile/h) for 10 min.

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check:J24B .

testgroup.title: DTC check
testgroup.question: Is there DTC(s) other than P0111?

testgroup.title: IAT sensor signal circuit and ground circuit check

test1.ptxt: Turn OFF ignition switch and disconnect connectors from MAF & IAT sensor and ECM.
Check for proper terminal connection to MAF & IAT sensor and ECM connectors.
If connections are OK, check that IAT sensor signal circuit (B1) and IAT sensor ground circuit (B2) are as follows.

item.ptxt: Wiring harness resistance of each IAT sensor signal circuit and ground circuit is less than 3 Ω.
Insulation resistance of IAT sensor signal circuit is infinity between MAF & IAT sensor connector and vehicle body ground.
Insulation resistance of wire harness is infinity between IAT sensor signal circuit terminal and each terminal at MAF & IAT sensor connector.
Insulation resistance of wire harness is infinity between IAT sensor ground circuit terminal and each terminal at MAF &s IAT sensor connector.
Circuit voltage of each IAT sensor signal circuit and ground circuit is 0 – 1 V with ignition switch in ON position.

testgroup.question: Are they in good condition?

action.ptxt: Repair or replace defective wire harness.
Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
